full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
================================
### Call for Proposals: Promotional Items

#### Tender Information

| **Property** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number/| WS4366479474
| Tender Closing Date | January 12, 2024 at 14:00 EST |
| Expected Contract Start Date | January 22, 2024 |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2024 |

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for promotional items to support the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF). The procurements are governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Procurement Details

The tender is classified under the UNSPSC Code for Promotional or Advertising Printing (82121505). The preferred method of delivery is in English, and all submissions must adhere to the Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence requires promotional items for the Royal Canadian Air Force. The promotional items will be used to support local, regional, provincial, and international events and activities.

*   The contract will be governed by the agreements of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and will be awarded based on the Selection Criteria of the Highest Combined Ranking of Technical Merit and Price.
*   The contract will have start and end dates as specified under Contract Details.

#### Contact Information

If you have any questions or require any additional information, please contact:

*   Maxine Holloway,
    Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC),
    11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

---

You can use [markdown](http://commonmark.org/help) links or raw HTML for proper syntax.

**Additional information:**

Please note that all bids submitted after 14:00 EST on January 12, 2024 will be declared non-responsive.
